Name: Shaheriar Malik
Description: A creative and driven Computer Engineering student with a strong background in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence, Embedded Systems, and Robotics, but also likes to spend time making art and producing music. Eager to work in a healthy team based environment that is equally as passionate and excited about building and creating new ways for people to connect with technology, and each other.

Education.Name: University of California, Riverside
Education.Degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Engineering

Experience.Name: Computational Imaging and Machine Intelligence Lab
Experience.Title: Research Assistant
Description: Investigating the utilization of different PPG/ECG biosensors to take cardiovascular measurements.
Analyzing the collected experimental medical data using Python and MATLAB.
Assisting in conducting experiments to explore different measurement techniques for optimization.

Experience.Name: MindTApp
Experience.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Developing and designing the UI for the iOS & Android applications using the Flutter SDK.
Dynamically presenting data fetched from the Google Firebase cloud server.
Coordinating with the Backend team to structure the app in the most efficient way possible.
Assured the quality and compatibility of the UI was consistent on every device.
Assisted in successfully launching the application on the App Store and Play Store
